data.title: Silapathar in Assam, Best places to visit, How to reach
data.meta_description: Silapathar is a city in the Indian state of Assam's Dhemaji district. The city is located on the northern bank of the Brahmaputra River, 470 kms from Guwahati.
data.text: Silapathar is a city in the Indian state of Assam's Dhemaji district. The city is located on the northern bank of the Brahmaputra River, 470 kilometers from Guwahati and only six kilometers from the Arunachal Pradesh border. Silapathar and Dibrugarh are linked by India's longest rail-road bridge. Silapathar is a small town in India that can be explored in a single day. In this town, there aren't many activities to do or places to visit.
